message.body: Are you guys going south for the holidays?
Yeah, we're driving down to va on Saturday. Then we're coming to Philly on New Year's Eve! You're gonna be there, right?
Cool! Yeah I'm trying to talk Sarah and Devin into coming down for NYE
I think Tim and Vicki will also be in town
How did your second interview go!? Any luck!?
Yeah Lorraine too. It was ok! The department is kinda lame.
Will find out next month I think
Alright. Would you take it?
Yeah. Then look for another.
Hah. Does it ever end?
I don't think so. How s yr search going?
Got my first invite yesterday. Gotta schedule it but will hopefully interview with UC Santa Barbara in Jan or Feb.
That's the only thing I've heard. At least it's something
Invite for a position?
Or interview? I don't know the terminology
Interview.
That's great!!
I got turned down from Georgia Southern.
Why do you have to know someone for everything
It's a racket
Pfft. Yeah, I'm excited but also stressed
And yes, it's a racket
It's the most stressful thing ever. Did I tell you for day 2 presentation I had to change my talk the night before?
No, but that sounds awful
Why?
The head of the department was like, "we are looking forward to your editing lecture tomorrow" which I never said i was doing. I was going to do cinematography. I spent 3 days prepping.
So, I changed it. I think it was worth it though
That's not really fair. I'm supposed to talk to the organizer at Ucsb this week to discuss the interview. I'll make sure to ask about the format of all the talks

Yeah that's a good idea. I was supposed to give a tech talk, that was my instruction and I didn't tell them anything specifically and it became apparent they were interested in an editing class from me and I guess they assumed I would just do that.
I think it helped me though.
I have to grade today.
